p: Water content was determined by oven-drying at 105°C [ 18]. Kjeltec Auto, type 1030 analyser (Tecator Co., Hoganas, Sweden), was used to determine the crude protein content. Lipids were isolated in ground samples with petroleum ether in Soxhlet apparatus (LTHS 500, Brnenská Druteva v.d., Czech Republic) and were determined gravimetrically [ 18].
